text: Yevgeni Alekseyevich Alfyorov (; born 31 January 1995) is a Russian football defender. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Zenit-2 St. Petersburg on 15 July 2013 in a game against FC Tosno. He made his Russian Football Premier League debut on 21 March 2015 for FC Arsenal Tula in a game against PFC CSKA Moscow. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:People from Taldykorgan Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Russia youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Arsenal Tula players Category:FC Khimki players
title: Yevgeni Alfyorov
